location_history.map: function (doc, meta) {if( doc.lhistid && doc.obid) emit([doc.obid], {"id":doc.lhistid, "obid":doc.obid, "dvid":doc.dvid,"building": doc.buid,"floor":doc.floor, "lat":doc.coordinates_lat, "long":doc.coordinates_lon,"timestamp":doc.timestamp}); }

location_history_by_buid.map: function (doc, meta) {if( doc.lhistid && doc.obid) emit([doc.buid, doc.floor], {"id":doc.lhistid, "obid":doc.obid, "dvid":doc.dvid,"building": doc.buid,"floor":doc.floor, "lat":doc.coordinates_lat, "long":doc.coordinates_lon,"timestamp":doc.timestamp}); }

location_history_by_obid_buid_floor.map: function (doc, meta) {if( doc.lhistid && doc.obid) emit([doc.obid, doc.buid, doc.floor], {"id":doc.lhistid, "obid":doc.obid, "dvid":doc.dvid,"building": doc.buid,"floor":doc.floor, "lat":doc.coordinates_lat, "long":doc.coordinates_lon,"timestamp":doc.timestamp}); }

location_history_obj_cat.map: function (doc, meta) {if( doc.lhistid && doc.objcat) emit(doc.objcat, doc.obid); }
location_history_obj_cat.reduce: function reduce(keys, values, rereduce){ if(rereduce){ var result=[];for(var i=0;i<values.length;i++){       var distinct=values[i];for(var j=0;j<distinct.length;j++){result.push(distinct[j]);}}return result.filter(function(e,i, arr){return arr.lastIndexOf(e)===i; });} return values.filter(function(e, i, arr){return arr.lastIndexOf(e)===i; }); }
